channel.title: Need a tutorial on adding specs
channel.description:
I need someone a [TUT] for adding specs or a spec bar. Everytime I try to add it, i get alot of errors. I tried Google.com I tried google.org/forums. i searched here. I just need help.
I have a pkisle source. Maybe thats the problem? Bezza (creator) organized everything.
